entry.def: Mucus is a thick liquid that is produced in some parts of your body, for example the inside of your nose.

means.word_mean: 1. protective secretion of the mucous membranes; in the gut it lubricates the passage of food and protects the epithelial cells; in the nose and throat and lungs it can make it difficult for bacteria to penetrate the body through the epithelium
